thread.section_title: The/Studio Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The/Studio | thestudio.com
thread.title: Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text: I had been searching locally and on the internet for a company who would make/create what I needed and was about to give up when I came across The/Studio. They not only worked with me on fronts that other companies would not, but they took the time to get things right -- and I'm a pain in the butt with design specifics! I need things perfect and historically, with whatever I'm involved in, I'm having to settle for far less than perfect. All of my patches were exactly what I wanted and asked for and I got them in a timely manner as promised. I can honestly say I'd be a happier person if every company I dealt with was like this company.
